item.title: More youTube stuff: I made a youTube badge.
item.description: So i decided to copy the success of my flickr badge and create a youtube badge. It works really easy and shows the last 6 videos you have uploaded. Its pretty cool. I used the youtube class i made the other day and just copied the functionality straight across from my flickr badge. haha. its awesome when you code well (its actually a mess… sadly). So check it out over at flashandburn.
